name: Killer's Blade
description: Thrust a caustic blade with lethal precision to stab an enemy, dealing 1161 Disease Damage. Deals 300% more damage to enemies below 25% Health.  Heals you for 3305 if the enemy dies within 2 seconds of being struck.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.
effectLines: Converts into a Stamina ability and deals Disease Damage. Also heals you if the target dies within two seconds of use.
coefDescription: Thrust a caustic blade with lethal precision to stab an enemy, dealing $1 Disease Damage. Deals 300% more damage to enemies below 25% Health.  Heals you for $2 if the enemy dies within 2 seconds of being struck.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.
